name: Pa's Butcher EARLY ACCESS
description:
Does this game reuse assets from Meat Bike? NO!!

Meat bike was a little side thing I made, Meat Bike has the reused assets. That aside.

This game is point and click! Z or E to interact! W A S D or the arrow keys to move the cursor. I apologize for the messiness of the game right now! It's at a VERY early stage. I'm hoping for this game to be at least 1 hour long!

Feedback, (negative is fine) is appreciated! I have never made a point and click game before. Nor a story or horror game, this is all new to me! 

WARNING: THE GAME ENDS ABRUPTLY!! IT ISN'T A GLITCH!
